**Track Your Entertainment Journey**

Noted is a tracker that helps you organize movies, TV series, books, and games across **To-Do** and **Finished** lists. Discover new titles, and analyze your habitsâ€”all in one app.

## Features  
- **Track Everything**  
  - Movies, TV shows, books, and games.  
  - To-Do (plan to watch/read/play) and Finished lists.  
- **Monthly Rollover**  
  - Automatically archives completed items and lets you migrate unfinished ones.  
- **Discover**  
  - Search using [TMDB](https://www.themoviedb.org/), [RAWG](https://rawg.io/), and [Google Books](https://developers.google.com/books) APIs.  
- **Insights**  
  - View statistics (e.g., monthly progress, favorite genres).  
- **Customize**  
  - **Themes**: Auto (monthly) or manual.  
  - **Localization**: Multilingual support via Slang.  
- **Backup & Restore**: Export and import data to/from JSON.  

## API Keys  
Noted uses:  
- [TMDB](https://developers.themoviedb.org/3) (movies/TV)  
- [RAWG](https://rawg.io/apidocs) (games)  
- [Google Books](https://developers.google.com/books) (books)  

**Default keys are rate-limited.** For more usage, add your own in *Settings > Change API*.
